title: Santos (Joaquim José de Faria)
body: He was born in Funchal on January 21, 1822, and served as a clerk in the city council's secretariat. He collaborated in the Archivista, Ordem, Baratissimo, Madeira, and Verdade publications, and passed away in this city on April 12, 1886.

Joaquim José de Faria Santos: Clerk in the city council's secretariat.
